summary.para: Enables an object's Dispose method to be called when the request completed.
Return value is subscription token. If calle token.Dispose() then canceled register.

member.name: P:Owin.IOwinRequestScopeContext.Items
member.summary: Gets a key/value collection that can be used to organize and share data during an HTTP request.

member.name: P:Owin.IOwinRequestScopeContext.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets the initial timestamp of the current HTTP request.

member.name: P:Owin.OwinRequestScopeContext.Current
member.summary: Gets or sets the IOwinRequestScopeContext object for the current HTTP request.

member.name: M:Owin.AppBuilderOwinRequestScopeContextMiddlewareExtensions.UseRequestScopeContext(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Boolean)
member.param: OwinRequestScopeContext.Item is threadsafe or not. Default is threadsafe.
